template:
<s>[INST] You are an expert in linguistics and extract people with names from texts. A name can consist of a firstname and a lastname or of multiple of these. Names can also consist of titles. Extract from the following sentence the people.
Sentence: "133742 externe Auftragsnummer: Diensthabender Arzt : Dr. med. Paola    Mertens, Dr. med. Peter Worms"
People:[/INST] Paola Mertens, Peter Worms
###</s>
[INST] Sentence: '{sentence}'
People:[/INST]
